text: Awubabonanga na wena abo babexelelwe ukuba babambe izandla zabo (ekulweni) benze iSalâh, banikele ngeZakâh kodwa kwathi kusakuyalelwa ukuba balwe; iqela elithile kubo lasuka loyika abantu langa loyika uAllâh okanye nangaphezulu. Bathi: “Yini na Nkosi yethu ukuba Usiyalele ukuba silwe? Awungesiniki ixesha elifutshane na Usimele?” Yithi wena: Eyona nto imfutshane lulonwabo lwalo mhlaba. UBomi oBuzayo bulunge ngaphaya kulowo uMoyikayo uAllâh, kwaye anizi kuphathwa ngentswela bulungisa (Nditsho) nengangomsonto oncwelwe wamde wepete yedatilisi
